recap_documents.description: OPINION AND ORDER,92730 the motion to dismiss is GRANTED with respect to the individual defedants, with leave to replead within 30 days of the date of this Order. The motion to dismiss the corporate defednants is DENIED. The Clerk of the Court is hereby directed to close this motion and remove it from the docket.
